newsitem.title: UK: New BZW Endowment Fund aims to raise 20 mln stg.
newsitem.headline: New BZW Endowment Fund aims to raise 20 mln stg.

text.p: Barclays Global Investors said it aims to raise up to 20 million pounds from the launch of a new fund, which will invest in traded endowment assurance policies.

It said in a statement the fund will be modelled on the existing BZW Endowment Fund Ltd (BZWEF), whose shares have traded up from 100 pence at launch in September 1993 to 141 pence and trades at a 14.9 percent premium to net asset value.

"Judging from the share price performance of BZWEF, there is clearly a demand for this uniquely structured product, which is an ideal investment for school fees or retirement," said Dan Nathanson of Barclays Global Investors.
The issue is expected to take place in November.
